title: think i deleted freind
body: i was chatting with my friend and my mouse started acting up I remember it was something with XDlove but  I forgot could you help me

replies.body: If you played games with them of any type recently look through those and find his name.

If you already deleted the friend from your list we won't be able to see who they were since we don't keep track of everyone who was ever on your friends list =\ . My best suggestion would be to reach out to them IRL or on a social network somehow, sorry we couldn't help more with that.
